enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: Financial support for participation in the UNFCCC process
sentences: The Secretariat presented on the impacts of the practice of not funding the participation of Parties whose contributions are outstanding.
Several SIDS urged financial support for two participants from SIDS delegations.
ARGENTINA and COLOMBIA said outstanding contributions by developing countries should not be interpreted as lack of willingness to pay.
